document.full_text: the repression that started after the december re-election of president aleksandr g. lukashenko has now spread beyond opposition leaders to people who had been strangers to politics.
document.title: minsk journal: in soviet-style belarus, crackdown extends to those outside politics
lines_and_colors: the repression that started after the december re-election of president aleksandr g. lukashenko has now spread beyond opposition leaders to people who had been strangers to politics.
